column1: [Levick] Charles Bassey on his workout with the Sixers: "When they saw me making 3s, they were surprised. ... They were shocked, they were excited."
2021 NBA Draft - #53 Pick: Charles Bassey (Western Kentucky)

[Pompey] Sixers second-round pick Charles Bassey is sitting at the end of the bench in street clothes for today's game against the Mavs. He's healthy. His not playing was his agent's decision, according to a source close to the situation. Bassey has yet to sign his contract.
[Pompey] Sixers sign second-round pick Charles Bassey to three-year contract after long holdup
